summary: 1997 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE DEFECTIVE BRAKE ROTORS ARE DEFECTIVE.  *MR  THE CONSUMER HAD A PROBLEM WITH THE BRAKE ROTORS IN WHICH THEY WERE REPLACED, THEN SIX MONTHS LATER RECEIVED A LETTER OF THE POTENTIAL PROBLEM, SO THE CONSUMER FORWARDED THE BILL TO CHRYSLER AND HASN'T BEEN REIMBURSED.  THE CONSUMER HAS REQUESTED COMPENSATION FOR REPAIR COST.  *SCC  *JB
